page.title: 02Parbold Hilldale,Housing
page.content: Many houses were built during the last 20 years as people from Liverpool and Manchester have settled here.There are no council houses but private estates of semi-detached and detached houses in Parbold behind the Community Centre and at Hilldale near the Post Office,built of brick.At Brandreth Delph there are 22 new houses.They are of a very modern style in reddish-brown brick,each with a double garage.One house is for sale.The estate agent's sign reads "A 5 bedroomed luxury detached property in large plot with picturesque lake nearby."There are many old stone-built houses and cottages one date reads 1692,some are converted from old barns we noticed the circular pitching holes and high barn doors.The Smithy is now a private house,the old Stores at Bispham Green is a private residence but it has the big shop window still at the front.
